Title: Neural Network Simulation
Description: Soul is a neural network simulation system
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Soul is a neural network simulation system

Overview
The main goal of soul project is to provide new tools for neuroscicence researchers to better integrate theoretical and experimental study. It use F# to solve differential equations, C# to model neuron in various biophysical levels, and WPF GUI to manage network structure and simulation process.

ReleaseLog

SourceCode Control have been adopted to Git, check the latest development progress of Soul on GitHub:
